news.title: CVPR 2025 Conference Participation in Nashville, USA
news.description: The IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition 2025 was held from Wed June 11th - Sun June 15th, 2025 at the Music City Center, Nashville TN. The IEEE / CVF Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition Conference (CVPR) is the premier annual computer vision event comprising the main conference and several co-located workshops and short courses. With its high quality and low cost, it provides an exceptional value for students, academics and industry researchers.

news.title: Digital Emergency Communication (DIGeMERGE) 2025 Conference
news.description: I have presnted a paper on machine learning approach for emergency communication
